item.description:
New England Steak and Seafood has been owned and operated by the Quirk family since 1956. For over 50 years they have been providing the area with unsurpassed excellence, in casual dining, in a quaint Old New England atmosphere. To go with your meal, they offer soft drinks, draft and bottled beer, and an Extensive Wine List that changes regularly. They accept all major credit cards. New England Steak and Seafood is listed as one of the top 10 restaurants in Central Massachusetts. Route 16 in Mendon, MA
http://www.nesteakand...
item.how_to_find_us: Ask Hostess for the Meetup Group
item.name: New England Steak & Seafood - Route 16, Mendon MA
